00041 class ConditionVarSolaris :
00042             public sys::ConditionVarInterface < cond_t,
00043             sys::MutexSolaris >
00044 {
00045 public:
00046     typedef ConditionVarInterface < cond_t, MutexSolaris > Parent_T;
00047     ConditionVarSolaris()
00048     {
00049         mMutex = new MutexSolaris();
00050         if ( ::cond_init(&mNative, NULL, NULL) != 0)
00051             throw sys::SystemException("ConditionVar initialization failed");
00052     }
00053 
00055     ConditionVarSolaris(MutexSolaris* theLock, bool isOwner = false) :
00056             Parent_T(theLock, isOwner)
00057     {
00058         if ( ::cond_init(&mNative, NULL, NULL) != 0)
00059             throw sys::SystemException("ConditionVar initialization failed");
00060     }
00061

00064
